dcterms:creator: Ruining He
Julian McAuley
dcterms:description: Amazon datasets contain users’ implicit feedbacks and rich product attributes (such as size, price, platform and category). The dataset is processed to focus on attributes that appear in the top 25%, specifically price, platform, and theme.
dcterms:title: Amazon-Video Games

dcterms:creator: F Maxwell Harper
Joseph A Konstan
dcterms:description: Movielens is a classical recommendation dataset with user attributes. The dataset is filtered to include only ratings that equal 5 as users’ liked movies, increasing the sparsity of the user-item behavior matrix.
dcterms:title: Movielens-1M

dcterms:creator: F Maxwell Harper
Joseph A Konstan
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 20 million rating records of movies that users watched, as well as item attributes. Items are rated by users as positive feedbacks, and each item belongs to several genres.
dcterms:title: Movielens-20M
